statements: UPDATE sms_messages SET message_body = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE sms_messages SET sender_phone_number = '+1234567890', received_datetime = '2022-05-20 09:00:00' WHERE receiver_phone_number = '+9876543210';
UPDATE sms_messages SET message_body = 'New message body' WHERE message_id = 1
UPDATE sms_messages SET receiver_phone_number = '+1234567890', sent_datetime = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE sender_phone_number = '+9876543210'
UPDATE sms_messages SET sender_number = '+123456789', message_text = 'Updated message' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sms_logs SET status = 'Delivered' WHERE message_id = 3;
UPDATE sms_messages SET message_text = 'New Message Text', timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sms_logs SET status = 'Sent', log_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE sms_messages SET sender='Alice', message_text='Hello, this is Alice.' WHERE message_id=1;
UPDATE message_status SET status='Delivered', status_timestamp='2023-08-15 09:30:00' WHERE status_id=2;
UPDATE sms_messages SET sender = 'Alice', receiver = 'Bob' WHERE message_id = 12345;
UPDATE message_logs SET log_text = 'Message delivered successfully' WHERE message_id = (SELECT message_id FROM sms_messages WHERE sender = 'Alice' AND receiver = 'Bob');
UPDATE sms_messages SET message_text = 'New message text' WHERE message_id = 1
UPDATE sms_status SET status = 'Delivered' WHERE message_id = 2
UPDATE sms_messages SET message_text = 'Updated message content' WHERE message_id = 12345;
UPDATE sms_status SET status = 'DELIVERED' WHERE status_id = 54321;
UPDATE sms_messages SET message = 'Updated message content' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE sms_messages SET sender_id = 1002, message = 'Good morning!' WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE contacts SET contact_name = 'John Doe', contact_number = '+123456789' WHERE id = 5;
